summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Genesee Street, from 21st Avenue Southwest to 23rd Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and concrete stairway and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14674 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
